contest-event.event-date:
June 15, 1874 D Burslem Contest
Burslem Contest 0 Other
burslem-contest
None
Simon Boccanegra (arr. Bonnisseau)
Porthill Park, Burslem Prizes: £47 and Bb bombardon, £32 5s and Bb euphonium, £21 10s and Bb baritone, £15 and Bb flugel horn.
Cornet prize (cornet value 12 guineas) to Mr Peers (Stalybridge)
Malinslee Band were disqualified from taking the 3rd prize through having professionals, thus Chesterton gained a prize.
Oct. 24, 2012, 10:27 p.m. Oct. 24, 2012, 10:51 p.m.
1 Stalybridge Old Band John Peers
2 Kingston Mills Band John Gladney Jnr
3 Stafford Rifle Mr. McAllister
4 Chesterton United J. E. Brindley
5 1st Staffordshire Artillery Thomas Dawson
Disqualified Malinslee Mr. Millington
Withdrawn Compstall Band Unknown
Withdrawn St. George's Old Unknown
Withdrawn Wednesbury Band Unknown
